alert.note: Alert for Livingston Area (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 10 at 12:43PM MST until November 12 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO NOON MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Livingston Area. * WHEN...From 6 AM Saturday to noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Interstate 90 from Livingston to Big Timber and roads along the Beartooth Foothills.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route. Secure outdoor objects.
